00057 // Config.cpp: implementation of the Config class.
00058 //
00060 
00061 #include "stdafx.h"
00062 #include "SBWConfig.h"
00063 #include "SBWRawException.h"
00064 #include "SBWCommunicationException.h"
00065 #include "SessionKey.h"
00066 
00067 #ifdef WIN32
00068 #include <io.h>
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #ifdef HAVE_SYS_STAT_H
00072 #include <sys/stat.h>
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 using namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench;
00076 
00077 #define SESSION_KEY_LENGTH 256
00078 std::string SessionKey::key;
00079 
00080 std::string SessionKey::getKey()
00081 {
00082         if (SessionKey::key.empty())
00083                 SessionKey::loadKey();
00084         return SessionKey::key;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void SessionKey::loadKey()
00088 {
00089         std::string keyFile = Config::getSessionKeyFile();
00090 
00091 #ifdef LINUX
00092         struct stat statbuff;
00093 #endif
00094 #ifdef WIN32
00095         if (access(keyFile.c_str(), 0 ) == 0)
00096 #else
00097         if (stat(keyFile.c_str(), &statbuff) == 0)
00098 #endif
00099         {
00100             TRACE("Loading session key from " << keyFile.c_str());
00101             
00102             FILE *fp;
00103             if ((fp = fopen(keyFile.c_str(), "r")) != NULL)
00104             {
00105                 char buffer[2*SESSION_KEY_LENGTH + 1];
00106 
00107                 fgets(buffer, 2*SESSION_KEY_LENGTH + 1, fp);
00108                 fclose(fp);
00109                 std::string theKey(buffer);
00110                 SessionKey::key = theKey;
00111                 return;
00112             }
00113         }
00114 
00115         TRACE("Cannot load session key from " << keyFile.c_str());
00116 }
